sentences.sContent: Both vegetables and quadratic polynomials are made more interesting with the Mandelbrot set. The formula explains the repeating complexity of broccoli heads like this one.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both vegetables and quadratic polynomials are made more interesting with the Mandelbrot set. The formula explains the repeating complexity of broccoli heads like this one.
sentences.sCn: 有了曼德尔勃特集合，蔬菜和二次多项式都变得有趣多了。这个方程式表现了类似图中的花椰菜菜籽的重复的复杂性。

sentences.sContent: Both vegetables and quadratic polynomials are made more interesting with the Mandelbrot set.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both vegetables and quadratic polynomials are made more interesting with the Mandelbrot set.
sentences.sCn: 有了曼德尔勃特集合，蔬菜和二次多项式都变得有趣多了。

sentences.sContent: The quadratic equation may have instilled horror in many of us.
sentences.sContent_eng: The quadratic equation may have instilled horror in many of us.
sentences.sCn: 对很多人来说，二次方程是很恐怖的。

words.tran: 百万之四次方；千的五次方

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the second power
an equation containing one or more terms in which the variable is raised to the power of two, but no terms in which it is raised to a higher power
